section.title: Description
section.p: "Identifies the nutrient which is to be modified" (e.g., sodium, potassium) - ONC S&I Clinical Element Data Dictionary (CEDD), March 2012.
Note that this definition would imply that some other information is needed such as how to modify the nutrient. This class is therefore incomplete pending further discussion.

stentry.p: "Code which identifies the nutrient which is to be modified" (e.g., sodium, potassium) - ONC S&I Clinical Element Data Dictionary (CEDD), March 2012.
